title: More bans
body:
As many players and have probably thought when playing ranked or a mode where there are bans i.e. limited game modes, 'Why aren't there more bans?'

Currently, there can be a total of 6 bans, this is 4.6% of the champion pool and due to the nature of the game, there are always more than 6 'flavour-of-the-month' or more correctly 'flavour-of-the-patch' champions.

With the new dynamic queue being slowly rolled out I propose that everyone gets one ban adding up to 10 total bans, this is 7.6% of the champion pool. 10 bans aren't heaps more than what we have currently got and by giving everyone a ban apiece it allows them to ban for themselves and hopefully reduce some of the saltiness that comes when a pretty obvious champ doesn't get banned and proceeds to face-roll your entire team.

I understand - with my current knowledge - that the number of bans is really only troubling lower tier players, but I am sure every player would love the chance to ban for themselves
